response.original_title: Alla ricerca di Simurg, in volo verso la rotta balcanica
response.overview: "Alla ricerca di Simurg" is the perhaps utopian journey of a large group of artists who, through music and song, like birds in a flock, create opportunities to raise awareness of the phenomenon of migration, with particular attention to the Balkan route. A great musical caravan that moves from stage to stage, concert to concert, from Veneto to Friuli, until it reaches the heart of Sarajevo and brings its musical presence to the city and the refugee camps of Blažuj and Ušivak: music and song as a tool for knowledge and encounter between humanity and cultures in motion, but also as a living testimony of those who have had similar experiences and are part of the multi-ethnic choir Voci dal Mondo in Italy.
